#summary Android Application install

= Android Application =

After installing the extension in your desktop browser you have to install the Apk in your Android phone.


= Details =

*Note that this application requires Android 2.2 ("Froyo") or later. *

[http://code.google.com/p/chrometophone/downloads/detail?name=chrometophone-android-v1.6.apk&can=2 Download the apk] to your phone and then follow the [http://code.google.com/p/chrometophone/wiki/SetupInstructions setup instructions].
